snippet: JUDELL--Robert. The Board of Directors and the members of Quaker Ridge Golf Club are saddened by the passing of our beloved friend, past president and esteemed member of more than 70 years, Robert Judell. His contributions to the Club were many and his presence will be sorely missed. We extend our heartfelt sympathy to his wife Eileen and the entire family in their time of sorrow. Marc Friedman, President 1/3
lead_paragraph: JUDELL--Robert. The Board of Directors and the members of Quaker Ridge Golf Club are saddened by the passing of our beloved friend, past president and esteemed member of more than 70 years, Robert Judell. His contributions to the Club were many and his presence will be sorely missed. We extend our heartfelt sympathy to his wife Eileen and the entire family in their time of sorrow. Marc Friedman, President 1/3
